name: Zen Clone
description:
A game where your aim is to reach the center of the board and blow up the orange square.

To start the destruction click on any side of the gird.

You can choose between a bomber or a cloner vessel by hitting the space bar.

A cloner vessel clones on its left and right after hitting each square but is not immune to the grey walls

A bomber destroys a 3x3 radius on hitting a wall

The red blocks are mines which act like bombs. If a cloner hits a red block it blows up everything in a 3x3 radius, including other clones.
